sentences.en: a man distributing leaflets to passers-by
sentences.cn: 一个向路人派发传单的男子

sentences.en: And the business will have less money to distribute as dividends.
sentences.cn: 因此企业只能以较少的钱作为红利分配.

sentences.en: Distribute the paint evenly over the wall.
Distribute the topping evenly over the fruit.
sentences.cn: 将配料均匀地撒在水果上。

sentences.en: Distribute these pamphlets among them before you leave, will you?
sentences.cn: 请你在离开之前把这些小册子发给他们好 吗 ?

sentences.en: He started to print his own posters to distribute abroad.
sentences.cn: 他开始印刷自己的海报并发往国外。

sentences.en: I sort the letters, seal them and distribute them as well!
sentences.cn: 我把邮件归类, 加戳并把它们分发出去!

sentences.en: Inelastic collisions among photoelectrons rapidly distribute their initially gained energy throughout the region of ionized gas.
sentences.cn: 光电子之间的非弹性碰撞使它们原来获得的能量在整个电离气体中迅速分配.

sentences.en: Its main physiological function is to distribute essence - qi throughout the body.
sentences.cn: 它的主要生理功能是散精至身体的各个部分.

sentences.en: Make sure that your weight is evenly distributed.
sentences.cn: 注意让你的重量分布均匀。

sentences.en: Please distribute the examination papers round the class.
sentences.cn: 请把考卷发给全班同学.

sentences.en: She's using the russian satellite network to distribute that frequency worldwide.
sentences.cn: 她正在用俄国卫星网络来像全世界散播那个频率.

sentences.en: The authorities have abandoned any attempt to distribute food.
sentences.cn: 当局中止了分发食物的尝试。

sentences.en: Thousands of soldiers are working to distribute food and blankets to the refugees.
sentences.cn: 数以千计的士兵正在给难民们分发食物和毯子。

sentences.en: To prepare take note, straighten out, print and distribute the department meeting.
sentences.cn: 部门会议的准备、记录 、 整理 、 打印、分发和保管.

sentences.en: We didn't understand how difficult it was to distribute a national paper.
sentences.cn: 我们不了解分销一份全国发行的报纸有多难。

sentences.en: Why don't they print and distribute more tickets since tickets are so badly needed?
sentences.cn: 既然门票如此走俏,为什么不多印发些 呢 ?

words.tran_cn: 经销商；[电] 分配器；分配者；散布者；[电] 配电盘

trans.tran_cn: 分发，配销，分配，分散，撒，播
trans.tran_en: to share things among a group of people, especially in a planned way

trans.tran_cn: 分发， 分送； 分销； 使分布， 散布
trans.tran_en: to share things among a group of people, especially in a planned way
